mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Scorpion\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

set_ship_text.hailtext: No response... Communications systems offline.
Energy tether is online and ready for energy transfer operations.

set_ship_text.scan_desc: Energy and supply transfer systems online.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Energy tether is online and ready for energy transfer operations. We have ordnance available for resupply.

event.name: Inventory Status Request
event.incoming_comms_text: We have |Ship1Marines| battle ready Marines.^There are |Ship1MarineTeams| marine teams ready to be deployed.^There are |Ship1Cargos| units of cargo.^There are |Ship1EngineerTeams| teams of engineers ready to be deployed.^There are |Ship1MedicTeams| medical teams ready to be deployed.^Aboard, we have supplies of |Ship1CommsRelays| Comms relays and |Ship1SensorBuoys| Sensor buoys equipped and ready to be deployed.

event.name: Devin Supply Request
event.incoming_comms_text: Supply Ship Devin is standing ready to resupply TSN ships.^Stores:^Homing Torpedoes: |DevinHoming|^Nuclear Torpedoes: |DevinNuke|^EMP Torpedoes: |DevinEMP|^Mines: |DevinMine|^PShock Torpedoes: |DevinPShock|^Beacons: |DevinBeacon|^Tags: |DevinTag|^Probes: |DevinProbe|

event.name: Devin Active

set_ship_text.name: Devin
set_ship_text.desc: Auxillary supply ship for the TSN combat vessels
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Max. Supplies: 20 Homing, 15 EMP, 8 Nuke, 10 Mine, 10 PShock, 10 Beacon, 10 Tag, 10 Probes
set_ship_text.hailtext: Wrenches on standby, 4th Light!

event.incoming_comms_text: Supply Ship Devin is standing ready to resupply TSN ships.^Stores:^Homing Torpedoes: |DevinHoming|^Nuclear Torpedoes: |DevinNuke|^EMP Torpedoes: |DevinEMP|^Mines: |DevinMine|^PShock Torpedoes: |DevinPShock|^Beacons: |DevinBeacon|^Tags: |DevinTag|^Probes: |DevinProbe|

event.name: Track Homing
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Homing Torpedo load is low. We have started the manufacturing process and are now converting raw materials to increase our supplies.

event.name: Track Nuke
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Nuclear Torpedo load is low. We have started the manufacturing process and are now converting raw materials to increase our supplies.

event.name: Track Tag

event.name: Track Probe
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Probe load is low. We have started the manufacturing process and are now converting raw materials to increase our supplies.

event.name: Homing Full
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Homing Torpedo stores are at full capacity.

event.name: Nuke Full
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Nuclear Torpedo stores are at full capacity.

event.name: EMP Full
event.incoming_comms_text: Our EMP Torpedo stores are at full capacity.

event.incoming_comms_text: Our PShock stores are at full capacity.

event.name: Beacon Full
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Beacon stores are at full capacity.

event.name: Tag Full
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Tag stores are at full capacity.

event.name: Probe Full
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Probe stores are at full capacity.

event.name: Ship1 In Range
event.incoming_comms_text: Devin systems locked.^Setting up system interface....

event.name: Ship1 Ready
event.incoming_comms_text: system interface complete.^Awaiting resupply request.^Remain within 1000 of Devin, with shields offline, to initiate supply transfer.

event.name: Ship1 In Range
event.incoming_comms_text: Grant systems locked.^Setting up system interface....

event.name: Ship1 Ready
event.incoming_comms_text: system interface complete.^Awaiting resupply request.^Remain within 1000 of Grant, with shields offline, to initiate supply transfer.

event.name: Jinn Active

set_ship_text.name: Jinn
set_ship_text.desc: Auxillary supply ship for the TSN combat vessels
